content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains instructions for processing renouncements, including
end product (EP) control of requests for renouncement
effective date for discontinuing an award
system entries for discontinuing an award
, and
notification of renouncement of the right to
pension or Parents DIC
, and
benefits other than pension or Parents DIC
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 4  - Renouncements
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section None
